web_site_develop_card_data.title: Website Packages
web_site_develop_card_data.text_title: We develop websites in a wide range of niches creating digital solutions that are tailored to the needs of your business. We approach every client individually, making sure the resulting website perfectly reflects your vision

descriptions.text: Whether you want our web development agency Godev can integrate e-commerce elements into existing websites or develop a brand-new site that allows customers to order directly from you
Corporate websites are created to showcase your business to visitors, helping to establish a strong online presence for the company
We perform a thorough analysis of your business to develop a landing page that will be specifically tailored for your target audience, resulting in better lead generation
Our developers can create full-fledged online shops that would either feature only your business or allow you to invite other vendors to offer their goods and services there
We create web portals that provide the users with all the required information, and we focus on making navigation as easy as possible
Our team can develop a B2B website for any needs ranging from communication to performing transactions between the companies
We can make your custom website on WordPress, which allows you to easily access the admin panel and modify it based on your needs later, as well as to seamlessly update the content of your site
Depending on your project, our developers can use any of the popular frameworks to make an advanced and comprehensive website tailored for your business
Similar to WordPress, we can make a website on Joomla, adding customized elements and configuring the CMS for you

Joomla serves as an excellent document management system, ensuring that custom content management is both interactive and user-friendly. This software is particularly noted for its ease-of-use and responsive design capabilities

As a leading CMS in the e-commerce industry, OpenCart offers tools to help create a website that is both responsive and cost-effective. If you’re looking to automate web development  processes, OpenCart is an excellent choice

WordPress serves as a robust platform for ecommerce, enabling b2b companies to create scalable websites. We develop websites that effectively integrate with existing ERP systems. Our design team collaborates closely with your sales team to define your business goals, ensuring the final product meets the unique needs of b2b customers

tiles_section_card_data_e_com.title: Comprehensive E-commerce services
tiles_section_card_data_e_com.text_title: At Godev, we provide end-to-end ecommerce web development services tailored to meet the unique needs of your business

descriptions.text: We build scalable and secure online stores that cater to both B2B and B2C markets, providing a seamless shopping experience for all customers and increasing your market reach
Our focus on UX and UI design enhances the consumer journey, making navigation intuitive and engaging, which boosts conversion rates and encourages repeat business
As a digital marketing agency, we optimize your site for search engines and integrate marketing strategies to increase visibility, drive organic traffic, and improve your online presence
Our web design ensures optimal viewing and interaction across all mobile devices, enhancing usability and ensuring that your site looks great on any screen size

Our developers can use any of the popular frameworks in the foundation of your website. Depending on your needs and preferences, we will use a framework to optimize the speed and functionality of the resulting site
We integrate analytics tools to help you track performance, understand customer behavior, and make data-driven decisions to grow your business
We work with top ecommerce platforms and ecommerce software like Shopify, Magento, and WooCommerce to provide robust functionality and flexibility, tailored to your business needs

tiles_section_card_data_main.title: Digital Agency Godev
tiles_section_card_data_main.text_title: Selecting the right staff augmentation partner is crucial to your project’s success. Godev is a top-tier provider of staff augmentation services with several key advantages:

descriptions.text: Our agency was launched in 2010 and has been steadily building its reputation for the last thirteen years
We have now grown to have more than 80 full-time employees and have completed more than 400 different projects

We are experienced in almost all niches of online business, as our previous customers include a popular VPN provider, a car rental in Dubai, an online jewelry store, and even a freight exchange platform
We are committed to bringing your vision to life in order to deliver the exact experience you want your customers to have

tiles_section_card_data_outstaff.title: Why Godev is the right staff augmentation partner
tiles_section_card_data_outstaff.text_title: Selecting the right staff expansion partner is crucial to your project’s success. Godev is a top-tier provider of staff augmentation services with several key advantages:

descriptions.text: To work together effectively and fast start, we prioritize regular and open communication with your team members and guarantee the timely sharing of the most up-to-date project information
Godev has access to a vast network of IT professionals worldwide. This ensures you can find the right talent, regardless of location, to meet your project requirements
Discover effective solutions at minimum cost. Godev has developed skills to work with companies across various sectors, delivering high-quality solutions tailored to each client’s needs
We offer both short-term and long-term team extensions. You can hire our experts for a limited time project or for ongoing work without any time limits
To work together effectively and fast start, we prioritize regular and open communication with your team members and guarantee the timely sharing of the most up-to-date project information
Skilled development teams and IT experts are ready to start working right now. It’s an excellent solution for a startup and big company, which appreciate time and cost

tiles_section_card_data_cms.title: Benefits of using content management systems
tiles_section_card_data_cms.text_title: Content management systems streamline the process of managing and updating website content, allowing you to easily create, edit, and publish articles or posts without any frontend and backend website development knowledge

descriptions.text: Content management systems enhance productivity by enabling non-technical users to manage website content independently. This reduces the dependency on developers for routine updates, saving time and resources

With a CMS, you can easily implement the best SEO practices, helping your website rank better in search engines. Built-in tools and plugins make optimizing content for search engines straightforward and efficient, resulting in better discoverability and lead generation for your business

Content management systems improve collaboration by allowing multiple users to access and edit content with defined roles and permissions. This ensures a more organized workflow and efficient project management
They offer scalability, allowing your website to grow as your business evolves without a complete overhaul. You can easily add new features, pages, and functionalities as your requirements change

tiles_section_card_data_b2b.title: Benefits of a B2B e-commerce solution from Godev
tiles_section_card_data_b2b.text_title: Partnering with Godev for your B2B eCommerce development offers numerous advantages:

descriptions.text: We create visually appealing and user-friendly designs that reflect your brand identity and enhance user experience
Our services extend to digital marketing, helping you reach a broader audience and drive engagement through targeted campaigns
Our commitment doesn’t end with the launch; we provide continuous support and maintenance to keep your website running smoothly
We implement effective SEO strategies to improve your website’s visibility and attract more qualified leads
We prioritize the security of your website, implementing robust measures to protect sensitive data and ensure compliance with industry standards
Our solutions ensure smooth integration with existing systems, including payment gateways, inventory management, and CRM platforms, streamlining your operations
Our solutions are designed to grow with your business, accommodating increased traffic and expanding product lines without compromising performance

tiles_section_card_data_website.title: Types of websites we work with
tiles_section_card_data_website.text_title: Our team of 80 web developers is ready to help you in all popular niches. Let us go through the main types of websites we can create

descriptions.text: Our web development team puts huge effort into design and optimization of landing pages, ensuring a positive first impression from the visitors and granting high conversion rates

We build professional shopping platforms that are comfortable both for vendors and customers. Depending on the niche of your online store, we will create a custom layout and architecture that will match the needs of your visitors

Our specialists are always ready to deliver high quality web portals with sophisticated yet intuitive infrastructure that allows the visitors to access the information and engage with the content easily

We create B2B sites for all purposes, starting with introducing product catalogs and ending with CRM integration for optimizing the interactions with other companies. Our web designers and developers will make sure the resulting collaboration is efficient and tailored to your specific niche or task

We develop professional websites with custom user interface (UI) with all the popular content management systems (CMS). This will allow you to avoid your fresh site feeling generic, while offering the same comfort of managing site content. It’s a cheaper solution compared to developing websites on frameworks
Our team can integrate various cloud-based solutions to your new website. Opting-in for cloud services will dramatically reduce the operational costs with a seamless integration to your business

Our developers can use any of the popular frameworks in the foundation of your website. Depending on your needs and preferences, we will use a framework to optimize the speed and functionality of the resulting site

tiles_section_card_data_webdev.title: Advantages of choosing Godev for website development

descriptions.text: Godev builds websites and online apps that match the goals of your business. We research every niche thoroughly and implement all the features and specifications you request

Godev integrates the latest tech innovations to craft websites that look and feel modern. Our team works with all programming languages and Content Management Systems, constantly keeping up with every update

After our services are delivered, we continue providing support for the projects. Our help desk is on call 24/7, always ready to quickly resolve any technical issues or assist with implementing new functionality

Software produced by Godev serves as a stable foundation that can be easily expanded on in the future. All the elements required for further expansion are laid down during the architecture planning stage, making it easier to implement additional functions or accommodate heavier traffic

tiles_section_card_data_support.title: Benefits of choosing Godev
tiles_section_card_data_support.text_title: Our professional web development team has been in the market for 13 years now, earning top-rated scores among clients. There are several key benefits that make our development company stand out when it comes to website support or application maintenance

descriptions.text: Our professional team has been working in the IT market for 13 years, with experience in website development, mobile applications, software development, and technical support for numerous projects. We oversees maintenance and provides technical support

Our wide range of services includes post-launch integration of new features. Whenever a need for something fresh arises, our frontend development and back-end development teams are always ready to jump on the task and have it finished according to your vision in no time. These are the same specialists developing the websites in the first place, meaning they will already be familiar with the architecture of your particular site

In case any performance issues arise with the website, we immediately look into them, whether it is to polish the responsive design of the user interface (UI) or improving the loading speeds of specific pages. We perform both desktop and mobile optimization for all the websites we launch

Our agency has been in business since 2010, and we have completed more than 400 different projects throughout these years. The websites we have launched continue to bring millions of visitors to their owners, many of whom have been collaborating with us for years now

Our team takes over all the maintenance tasks, saving you time and effort on managing it yourself. And while we take over the majority of the responsibilities, we still follow your creative vision when adding new features or polishing the existing ones. This approach allows us to collaborate together to achieve the desired result in the most time-efficient manner

We have an optimized process of website maintenance, allowing you to save money on hiring your own specialists. The support is performed by the same developers who create the websites, meaning they already know the architecture and infrastructure of its core systems

We are available at all times and never hesitate to help you out no matter the issue. Whether it is a bug, an access problem, or a new feature request, you can rely on our team to complete the task quickly and efficiently

We are on call 24/7, meaning you can both easily have developers working on an urgent issue or simply contact us regarding a less urgent matter at any time. We are always willing to listen to your ideas and come up with suggestions that will help bring them to life according to your vision

tiles_section_card_data_mobile.title: Stages of creating a mobile application
tiles_section_card_data_mobile.text_title: The process of creating a mobile project involves several crucial steps. Each step is designed to ensure that your app is developed efficiently and meets your business objectives. Here are the main stages involved in creating a successful application:

descriptions.project_type: Analysis of the market and competitors
descriptions.text: We begin by defining the scope of your e-commerce project and identifying your business goals. This helps create a solid foundation for the development phase
We describe the structure, design and functionality. Identification of important points
Consideration of architecture and logic

We will create a unique UX/UI interface design that meets your requirements and those of your business sector. Our team is committed to developing a user-friendly and engaging application design that will provide a seamless user experience
Frontend and backend development. Using core mobile technologies, we start building your app on the selected development platform. We focus on scalability, functionality, and performance
Once the app is developed, we conduct comprehensive testing to ensure that it is bug-free and performs well under various conditions
After testing, we launch the app on the App Store and Google Play, ensuring it’s accessible to your users
After the launch, we offer continuous support and maintenance, ensuring your app remains updated and functional over time

tiles_section_card_data_d2c.title: Our Advantages
tiles_section_card_data_d2c.text_title: At Godev, we pride ourselves on delivering exceptional D2C eCommerce solutions that align with your business objectives.

descriptions.text: We understand that each brand is unique. Our team crafts customized strategies to meet your specific needs and goals.
Our experienced designers create visually appealing and user-friendly interfaces that enhance the customer journey.
From SEO to social media campaigns, we offer a full suite of services to boost your online presence and conversion rates.
We implement proven techniques to maximize conversion rates, turning visitors into loyal customers.
Our solutions integrate smoothly with various sales channels, ensuring a cohesive brand experience.
We build ecommerce websites that grow with your business, accommodating increasing traffic and expanding product lines.
Our commitment doesn't end at launch. We provide continuous support to ensure your platform remains up-to-date and efficient.
With a portfolio of successful projects, we have a history of delivering results that exceed client expectations.

tile_squad.title_section: Boost your business with a landing page

descriptions.text: If you don’t have a website, convey information about your goods and services effectively through a landing page
Validate your ideas with minimal risks
We help to gather the leads for their following processing
Attract attention to a particular product
An opportunity to place the website on your business card or in the advertisement, which increases trust

tiles_section_card_data_landing.title: Godev’s advantages
tiles_section_card_data_landing.text_title: Godev specializes in creating landing pages for your business that drive results. Here’s what sets us apart:

descriptions.text: From design to development, we offer end-to-end landing page design services and support to ensure success
Our pages are compatible with CRMs, ecommerce platforms, and other tools, ensuring smooth implementation in your operations
As a trusted landing page development agency, we deliver results efficiently while maintaining exceptional quality
Whether for PPC landing pages or standalone projects, we personalize each page to match your business requirements and amplify your brand
Our team of landing page design experts combines creativity and technical skills to deliver high-converting landing pages tailored to your specific needs
Perfect for small business and presentation of goods or services
Suitable for boosting sales or validation of the hypothesis
A solution for those who are not fit the standard rates
